title.rendered: On June 20th, come and meet us at the Accompaniment morning for social start-up!

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section admin_label=”Section” fullwidth=”on” specialty=”off”][et_pb_fullwidth_image admin_label=”Image en pleine largeur” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/Visuel-2-1.jpg” show_in_lightbox=”off” url=”https://www.eventbrite.fr/e/billets-matinee-accompagnement-des-start-ups-sociales-34952408595″ url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”] [/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”section”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

ACCOMPANIMENT MORNING FOR SOCIAL START-UP

June 20th 2017 | WAI Paris
19, boulevard Poissonnière, 75002 Paris

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Convergences and BNP Paribas are pleased to invite you to the Accompaniment morning for social start-up at WAI Paris spaces (We Are Innovation), created by BNP Paribas. This session will consist in one round table, followed by participatory workshops devoted to social start-up.

This event is aimed at social entrepreneurs who launch or develop their projects. Participate to technical workshops and meet expert consultants who will share advices and experience feedbacks:

How to launch a project?
How to raise funds?
How to change scale?
How to measure impact?
Discover the Morning programme online.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button admin_label=”Bouton” url_new_window=”off” button_alignment=”center” background_layout=”light” custom_button=”on” button_letter_spacing=”0″ button_use_icon=”default” button_icon_placement=”right” button_on_hover=”on” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″ button_url=”https://www.eventbrite.fr/e/billets-matinee-accompagnement-des-start-ups-sociales-34952408595″ button_text=”Sign up” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#19a1b8″] [/et_pb_button][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” text_font_size=”11″]

Please note that seats are limited.
